quest.name: Assault on a Deadly Weapon
journal:
 Quest Sync
Mhon Mon is being plagued by hellish beasts and an empty stomach.
objectives: Lie in wait for the wandering weapon.

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: Oooh! What to do? What to do?

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: I want to make traditional Mord stew and I only need one more ingredient─Amber weed.

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: But it has become scarce around here, except for in an area that is plagued by evil weapons!

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: Funny name, not so funny when they are trying to kill you, though! There is an especially horrible one called the wandering weapon who the others seem to follow.

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: If you could get rid of it, the rest might leave us alone. Then I can finally harvest Amber weed in peace. So, will you help us?

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: I hate that wandering weapon and its big, stupid face!

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: You did it? Hooray! Now that Amber weed will be mine! Heh heh heh...

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: But I wonder if the other evil weapons will come back... I hear they were made by the mages of Nabaath Areng from enchanted swords. Do not ask me how they ended up looking like that, though!

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: Apparently, their masters disappeared after the Flood. With no one to command them, they have been prowling around Amber, attacking everything that comes close!

dialogue.name: MHONMON
dialogue.text: I hope that by getting rid of the wandering weapon, they will stay away for a while, but who can say? All I know is, I can make my stew now! My stomach thanks you!
